Articles.Content:
KSP Version: Version 0.25.0 Windows 64-bit

What Happens: Game Crashes When Trying to Launch

Mods / Add-Ons: None

Steps to Replicate:

1.) Install KSP

2.) Launch KSP

3.) ???

4.) Profit!

Result: I do not go to space today.

Fixes/Workarounds: Tried reinstalling and verifying local files through Steam.

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:

crash.dmp

error

output_log

report

My problem seems to be similar to the one in this thread perhaps?

System Specs:

Windows 7 Home (64 bit)

Intel Core i7-4810MQ

16GB RAM

Looks like a different issue. KSP tries to load DirectX 9 and 11 and fails both times, then crashes when it tries to run with OpenGL 1.1.

What video card do you have, and do you have current drivers for it?

Looks like a different issue. KSP tries to load DirectX 9 and 11 and fails both times, then crashes when it tries to run with OpenGL 1.1.

What video card do you have, and do you have current drivers for it?

I apparently managed to corrupt the drivers for my video card while updating them. So thanks for the help, reinstalling the drivers cleared it up.
